name: Solenta Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Solenta Aviation, founded in 2000, is a specialized commercial aviation company based in Johannesburg, South Africa. It operates cargo flights, passenger charters, and aircraft lease services across Sub-Saharan Africa, particularly for DHL, the oil and gas industry, and humanitarian organizations. Solenta Aviation has a robust training program, approved by the South African Civil Aviation Authority (SACAA), offering initial and recurrent training for flight crew, cabin crew, and engineers on various aircraft types including C208, B1900, ATR42/72, and Embraer ERJ 145. The company is committed to providing high-quality training using dedicated in-house examiners and state-of-the-art facilities like the Flight Navigation and Procedures Trainer. With a strong focus on safety and excellence, Solenta Aviation continues to be a leader in aviation services and training in Africa.
